cellery

Class CellArray2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • cellery.CellArray2D

  • public class CellArray2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A CellArray2D is a two dimensional grid of Cells. This object provides information to a client Automaton2D about the states of Cells in a region with a geometry that is specified by an instance of a Topology2D.
    Author:
    Zach Tidwell
    See Also:
    Topology2D}, {@link Automaton2D}, {@link Cell}

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int length
      The vertical dimension of this CellArray2D
      int width
      The horizontal dimension of this CellArray2D

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CellArray2D(int[][] intArray, Topology2D topo)
      Creates a CellArray2D from an array of ints and an instance Topology2D, which specifies the the geometry of neighborhoods about member Cells

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Retrieves the Cell in the ij-th position of this.

      Retrieves the number of living Cells in the vertical neighborhood about the ij-th cell of radius r.

      Kills the Cell at the ij-th position of this

      Returns the number of living Cells in the neighborhood consisting of the north-west and south-east corners of radius r about the ij-th cell.

              int j,
              int r)
        Retrieves the number of living Cells in the vertical neighborhood about the ij-th cell of radius r.

        i - row index containing the central cell.
        j - column index containing the central cell.
        r - the radius of the neighborhood.
        Returns:
        the number of living cells.

      • toBinaryArray

        public int[][] toBinaryArray()
        Gives an array of binary Values corresponding to the Cells in this. 1 indicates that the Cell is alive and 0 indicates that it is dead.
        Returns:
        the binary array represented the states of Cells in this
